---
title: "index"
author: "Sarah Hu"
date: "1/29/2022"
output: 
  html_document:
    number_sections: true
    theme: cosmo
    highlight: kate
    collapsed: false
    toc: true
    toc_depth: 4
    toc_float: true
  pdf_document:
    toc: true
    toc_depth: '4'

knit: (function(input_file, encoding) {
  out_dir <- 'docs';
  rmarkdown::render(input_file,
 encoding=encoding,
 output_file=file.path(dirname(input_file), out_dir, 'index.html'))})
---
